objects.text:
• Luxurious pink-hued lipstick with creamy formula
• Silky-smooth powder blush in rose pink shade
• Compact with built-in mirror for touch-ups
• Modern silver and black packaging design

product_details.name: Perfectly Pink Beauty Duo - Premium Blush & Lipstick Set
product_details.description:
• Luxurious pink-hued lipstick with creamy, long-lasting formula
• Silky-smooth powder blush in a flattering rose pink shade
• Professional-grade compact with built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups
• Modern silver and black packaging design
• Complementary pink shades for a coordinated makeup look
• Travel-friendly compact size
• High color payoff and buildable pigmentation
• Sleek matte black packaging with premium finish
• Perfect for creating natural to glamorous looks
• Ideal for daily wear and special occasions

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, feminine design emphasizing a pink-themed beauty product duo. Centered at the top is a prominent heading (`heading`) in a bold magenta font, followed by a slightly darker, richly styled subheading (`subheading`). A neatly aligned list of product features (`description`) is placed just below, adding informative context. The product itself (`product_image`) — a lipstick and blush compact — is visually displayed on the right side, drawing attention through contrast with the light background. At the bottom left, the price (`price`) is highlighted along with a strong call-to-action (`cta_button`, `cta`) in a bold magenta button. Layered pink wave curves and soft circular accents enhance the overall elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFD1DC` (background header)
- Blush Pink: `#FFF0F5` (canvas base)
- Hot Pink: `#D81B60` (primary text & button)
- Deep Berry: `#880E4F` (subheading)
- Cocoa Brown: `#5D4037` (description text)
- Soft Pink Circle Accents: `#FF69B4`
- White: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases a lipstick and blush in complementary shades of pink, set against a sleek black compact with reflective metallic accents. The dominant pink hue (#EC7CA8) of the lipstick and blush creates a fresh and feminine appeal, serving as the focal color. The black casing (#1A1A1A) adds sophistication and contrast, while the silver metallic holder (#C0C0C0) introduces an elegant, modern touch. These colors blend harmoniously, with the bold pink highlighted by the dark and neutral tones. A suitable advertisement color palette includes Pink (#EC7CA8), Black (#1A1A1A), Silver (#C0C0C0), and Soft White (#F5F5F5) for background balance.
